emails.subject: Welcome to Candymail 1!
emails.body:
Welcome {{Firstname}} {{Lastname}} to Candymail!

It's time to grow your product with email marketing - using just a JSON file.

Candymail is awesome because:

  • Portable: Create, share and reuse email marketing strategies between different products
  • Simple to use: Time to send, subject, and body of the emails can all be set up in a single JSON file
  • Compliance: Unsubscribe Option added to email footer
